title: Beautiful Craftsman on exceptional lot in most desireable neighborhood
posting_body: Highly desirable Old Palo Alto neighborhood.
Perfect for entertaining or a private quiet retreat.
Walking distance to all the amenities of Downtown, Cal Ave, and Midtown Palo Alto.
Traditional Craftsman quality with expertly upgraded kitchen and bathrooms.
Large open floor plan, big bay windows and beautiful surrounding porches.
Lush private gardens, three fireplaces, sunny backyard.
Detached cottage with fireplace and bathroom.
Centrally located to Palo Alto schools, walking or biking distance.
